content: boom new season new intro new beard new phone new craft idea and what better way
than to make my first entry into the world of craft or competition this is
how to do a quick and easy magic ring and it's for the subcategory handouts in
the August 2015 competition get three paper clips these are the kind with the
clear plastic coating on them which I like because they're a little thicker
and have a kind of mithril like white gleam to them straighten them out with
needlenose pliers secured three ends together by gripping
tightly with pliers and with your other hand braid them if you don't know how to
perform a classic three strand braid see the following figures
now Bend the assembly around your pointer finger leaving some slack so
that it will fit over the knuckle and cut it to length with wire cutters I
happen to get very lucky here the braided paperclip assembly just so
happened to be the perfect size for my finger so I didn't need to cut it now
put on your favorite song apply a healthy blob of hot glue to one end dip
the other end in the blob and then hold it there until the song is done not
kidding you must hold very still until the glue is totally cooled and hardened
now this actually looks decent as is but you could paint the stone however you
want I'll try blue I am why lock thank you
for joining me and I'll see you next time
you
